messages.title: 50 MILLION EXTRA GP APPOINTMENTS
messages.content: You shouldn't have to struggle to see your GP. That's why the Prime Minister is ensuring we deliver 50 million more GP appointments a year by 2024/25, helping more patients, and supporting our fantastic GPs and their teams.

messages.title: DON'T LET CORBYN TAKE US BACK TO SQUARE ONE.
messages.content: An extra £33.9 billion for the NHS. 20,000 extra police officers. More funding for every pupil in every school. Brexit done with a deal.

messages.title: OUR ECONOMY IS GROWING. OUR PUBLIC FINANCES ARE UNDER CONTROL.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: An extra £33.9 billion for the NHS to fund more hospitals and better services.
20,000 extra police officers to keep our streets safe.
More funding for every pupil in every school.
Get Brexit done with a deal.

issues.brexitEurope: Get Brexit done with a deal.
issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school.
issues.health: An extra £33.9 billion for the NHS to fund more hospitals and better services. 50 million extra GP appointments to ensure patients have better access to healthcare services.

images.caption: Our promises on the NHS, policing, education funding, and Brexit.
OUR ECONOMY IS GROWING. OUR PUBLIC FINANCES ARE UNDER CONTROL.
